desc: Emelvi is a young jewellery brand, inspired by the universe and the material that surrounds us. Emelvi guarantees quality, uniqueness and tradition. Our jewels are handmade and designed by our team, we rely on our Italian goldsmiths with thirty years of experience to ensure a unique and inimitable product.

layout.text: WE ARE NOT A BUYING AND SELLING BRAND
EMELVI DESIGNS EVERY SINGLE PIECE OF JEWELLERY.
HAVE A JEWEL THAT IS DIFFERENT FROM THE USUAL, WEAR A STORY, A CONCEPT, A REASON TO MAKE A CHANGE.
